meanings.definition: Not possessing artistic qualities or skills.
meanings.sent1: The simple, nonartistic drawing was still appreciated by many.
meanings.sent2: Her nonartistic approach to painting focused more on emotion than technique.
meanings.sent3: Even though he claimed to be nonartistic, his doodles were surprisingly creative.
meanings.sent4: The nonartistic design of the building made it stand out among the traditional architecture.
meanings.sent5: The nonartistic performance lacked the finesse and elegance of a true artist.

meanings.definition: Not related to or involved in the creation or appreciation of art.
meanings.sent1: The nonartistic committee focused solely on practical matters.
meanings.sent2: Her nonartistic interests lay in science rather than the arts.
meanings.sent3: The nonartistic event planner had a knack for organizing chaos.
meanings.sent4: His nonartistic mind was more suited to logic puzzles than abstract paintings.
meanings.sent5: The nonartistic approach to interior design resulted in a functional yet uninspiring space.
